span: Great leather & camera cover, but loose top button grip bugs me
review-date: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2025
a-link-normal: Color: Jet BlackSize: 512GBStyle: Flip7Pattern Name: Phone Only
review-text: The leather..like texture and design look premium without seeming cheap at all, and I love the included camera cover too.However, the grip area around the upper cover button doesn't fit snugly....it's lifted and loose, which bothers me constantly and makes me keep pressing it down to adjust

span: Great phones. Not compatible with medical devices

review-text: Fantastic phones.  Sadly Not compatible with most medical devices . Its small size is perfect but Samsung needs to get these phones approved for omnipod +other medical devices.

span: Worst software experience of any phone company.
review-date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2025
a-link-normal: Color: Blue ShadowSize: 512GBStyle: Flip7Pattern Name: Phone Only
review-text: Abysmal software. So disappointed with Samsung. -terrible front screen keyboard you are forced to use -unresponsive when I attempt to unlock the phone with finger print. It won't even attempt to read my print just won't respond at all. -refuses to bring up the keyboard when prompted. Samsung's awful keyboard literally refuses to open on the front screen so frequently. -keyboard constaly suggests spelling for words that is incorrect. It will go out of its way to autocorrect words to be completely misplspelled. This keyboard is by far the worst of any phone company. The fact they force you to use it on the front screen is horrendous and malicious design. GIVE US OTHER FRONT SCREEN KEYBOARD OPTIONS. FIX THE UNRESPONSIVE FRONT SCREEN THIS IS A TERRIBLE USER EXPERIENCE FOR A PHONE THAY COSTS PREMIUM $$$

span: Best Phone Available ATM but offers LESS
review-date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2025
a-link-normal: Color: Jet BlackSize: 512GBStyle: Fold7Pattern Name: Phone Only
review-text: I really enjoy the versatility of this phone with being able to go from candy bar to tablet. Unfortunately, the Z Fold 7 is not compatible with any stylus since Samsung did not include the necessary screen layer required to use with a stylus so some of the Samsung apps like Note have wasted features which is a shame. With a screen like this and all the draw/handwriting functionality of Samsung Note it's actually really frustrating that they didn't include a stylus for this phone. It also lacks a lot of camera features and functions... I went from an S22 Ultra to this and I'm still debating whether or not I'm going to keep it since my S22 Ultra actually has more options than the Z Fold 7. It's like they're engineering in the wrong direction but charging MORE for less. Unfortunately, Samsung is still the best option on the market right now and they know it.

review-date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2025

review-text: The phone is amazing except one thing is the battery life. I am a postgrstudent and need big screen for reading but with this kind of moderate reading battery life reached 30s percent by noon which is not good. Samsung got almost everything right EXCEPT the battery ðŸ”‹ which is the worst.

span: Good phone overall, but just good
review-date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2025
a-link-normal: Color: Blue ShadowSize: 256GBStyle: Flip7Pattern Name: Phone Only
review-text: Great phone overall, but the interface seems to freeze a bit when using it. Battery seemed fine, kept to around 40% at end of day with moderate use. Using it as a backup now though due to the freezing, which I'm guessing is just a firmware issue.
